summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing the removal of powers of attorney on her accounts. The letter indicates a formal communication regarding financial matters.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing changes to her financial accounts.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell, representing UBS Financial Services.

locations: 1285 Avenue of the Americas, 38th Floor, New York, NY 10019
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell sent a letter to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.
The letter serves as an authorization to remove powers of attorney on Maxwell's accounts.
